Description: A web page should declare what human language it is in
When a user interface component gains focus it does not change the context of the page
Changing something in the user interface does not change the context of the page
If help content is available then it be in the same order relative to the content
If input errors are automatically detected then the error is identified and described to the user
If user input is required then there should be a label or instructions for what input is required
Information the user entered previously should be either auto populated or available to select
